item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Paris is always a good idea." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "The best thing to hold onto in life is each other." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I've been lucky. Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "People, even more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed; never throw out anyone." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Make-up can only make you look pretty on the outside but it doesn't help if your ugly on the inside. Unless you eat the make-up." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Some people dream of having a big swimming pool. With me, itâ€™s closets" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "For my whole life, my favorite activity was reading. It's not the most social pastime." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Karen add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Karen add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Karen add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "This life is what you make it. No matter what, you're going to mess up sometimes, it's a universal truth. But the good part is you get to decide how you're going to mess it up. Girls will be your friends - they'll act like it anyway. But just remember, some come, some go. The ones that stay with you through everything - they're your true best friends. Don't let go of them. Also remember, sisters make the best friends in the world. As for lovers, well, they'll come and go too. And baby, I hate to say it, most of them - actually pretty much all of them are going to break your heart, but you can't give up because if you give up, you'll never find your soulmate. You'll never find that half who makes you whole and that goes for everything. Just because you fail once, doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything. Keep trying, hold on, and always, always, always believe in yourself, because if you don't, then who will, sweetie? So keep your head high, keep your chin up, and most importantly, keep smiling, because life's a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Karen add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Karen add a quote by Mary Schmich
item.description:
"Ladies and gentlemen of the class of '97:
Wear sunscreen.
If I could offer you only one tip for the future, sunscreen would be it. The long-term benefits of sunscreen have been proved by scientists, whereas the rest of my advice has no basis more reliable than my own meandering experience. I will dispense this advice now.
Enjoy the power and beauty of your youth. Oh, never mind. You will not understand the power and beauty of your youth until they've faded. But trust me, in 20 years, you'll look back at photos of yourself and recall in a way you can't grasp now how much possibility lay before you and how fabulous you really looked. You are not as fat as you imagine.
Don't worry about the future. Or worry, but know that worrying is as effective as trying to solve an algebra equation by chewing bubble gum. The real troubles in your life are apt to be things that never crossed your worried mind, the kind that blindside you at 4 p.m. on some idle Tuesday." -- Mary Schmich

item.title: Karen add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Karen add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "At some point in life the world's beauty becomes enough. You don't need to photograph, paint, or even remember it. It is enough." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Karen add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it." -- Confucious

item.title: Karen add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "Hey, girls, you're beautiful. Don't look at those stupid magazines with sticklike models. Eat healthy and exercise. That's all. Don't let anyone tell you you're not good enough. You're good enough, you are too good. Love your family with all your heart and listen to it. You are gorgeous, whether you're a size 4 or 14. It doesn't matter what you look like on the outside, as long as you're a good person, as long as you respect others. I know it's been told hundreds of times before, but it's true. Hey, girls, you are beautiful." -- Gerard Way

item.title: Karen add a quote by Richard Rodgers
item.description: "Do I love you because you're beautiful, or are you beautiful because I love you?" -- Richard Rodgers

item.title: Karen add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The ideals which have always shone before me and filled me with joy are goodness, beauty, and truth." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Karen add a quote by William Shakespeare
Karen add a quote by Gwyneth Paltrow
item.description: "Beauty, to me, is about being comfortable in your own skin. That, or a kick-ass red lipstick." -- Gwyneth Paltrow

item.title: Karen add a quote by Katerina Stoykova Klemer
item.description: "There is no beauty in sadness. No honor in suffering. No growth in fear. No relief in hate. Itâ€™s just a waste of perfectly good happiness." -- Katerina Stoykova Klemer

item.title: Karen add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Electricity is really just organized lighting" -- George Carlin

item.title: Karen add a quote by Justina Chen Headley
item.description: "I didn't know that the world could be so mind-blowingly beautiful." -- Justina Chen Headley

item.title: Karen add a quote by Tara Brach
item.description: "Observing desire without acting on it enlarges our freedom to choose how we live." -- Tara Brach
